content: Saurabh Bilgaiyan - KIIT School of Computer Engineering Skip to content Go to KIIT Home pageKIIT HomeProf. Achyuta Samanta Founder – KIIT & KISS achyutasamanta.com Saurabh Bilgaiyan Saurabh Bilgaiyan Saurabh Bilgaiyan Associate ProfessorDr. Saurabh Bilgaiyan holds a distinguished position as a faculty member in the School of Computer Engineering at KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, India. With a strong passion for both teaching and research, he brings extensive expertise and academic experience to the university’s vibrant learning ecosystem. He earned his Ph.D. in Computer Science & Engineering from KIIT, Deemed to be University in 2018. He holds a Master of Technology (M.Tech) in Computer Science & Engineering from the same institution (2014) and a Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) from BIRT, under Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV), Bhopal (2012). Dr. Bilgaiyan is actively engaged in cutting-edge research and has published extensively in reputed peer-reviewed journals, edited volumes, and conference proceedings. His scholarly contributions have garnered significant recognition in the academic community. He is currently supervising M.Tech and Ph.D. scholars in emerging areas of computer science. He also serves as a reviewer for various prestigious international journals and conferences, further demonstrating his expertise and commitment to academic excellence.
